verbose_text: TAC induced significant cardiac hypertrophy, as characterized by an increased left ventricular wall thickness [left ventricular anterior wall thickness at end diastole (LVAWd)], decreased left ventricular cavity dimension [left ventricular internal dimension at end diastole (LVIDd)], increased heart-to-body weight ratio and an expanded cross-sectional area of cardiomyocytes in the GFP treated mice.
evidence: TAC induced significant cardiac hypertrophy, as characterized by an increased left ventricular wall thickness [left ventricular anterior wall thickness at end diastole (LVAWd)], decreased left ventricular cavity dimension [left ventricular internal dimension at end diastole (LVIDd)], increased heart-to-body weight ratio and an expanded cross-sectional area of cardiomyocytes in the GFP
